Package main.java.logic.translation

Class TranslationManager

java.lang.Object
main.java.logic.translation.TranslationManager
public class TranslationManager extends Object
Manager for the translation and file managing process, combined.
Version:
May 2024
Author:

  • Constructor Details

    • TranslationManager

      public TranslationManager(ResourceBundle messages) throws ResourceException
      Throws:
      ResourceException

  • Method Details

    • translateAll

      public void translateAll() throws TranslationException
      Translates a source file, according to the specified translation mode, into a given target language (can be more than 1! - and a maximum of 3).
      Throws:
      TranslationException - specifically caused by issues with automatic translation (api and database access)

    • input

      public void input(String path) throws PropertiesException, IOException
      Inputs the file that the user wishes to translate. This file must be compliant with i18n properties format. If not, an exception is thrown. Otherwise, the file is parsed and its relevant information saved for further processing.
      Throws:
      PropertiesException - if the .properties file deviates from the expected format, including issues like invalid file name format or incorrect content
      IOException - when there are issues encountered during the process of reading from or writing to a file, such as file not found, permission denied, or disk full errors if file is not format-compliant

    • to

      public void to(String directory)
      Parameters:
      directory - path where all target files will be saved

    • saveAll

      public void saveAll() throws IOException, PropertiesException
      Saves results of all translations, depending on the chosen translation mo. For each file, if its results have already been written to a temporary review file, they are copied onto the new path. Otherwise, results are written for the first time in their specified file path.
      Throws:
      PropertiesException - if the .properties file deviates from the expected format, including issues like invalid file name format or incorrect content
      IOException - when there are issues encountered during the process of reading from or writing to a file, such as file not found, permission denied, or disk full errors

    • review

      public List<String> review() throws IOException
      Retrieves results of all automatically-translated, with review purposes. These results are processed and returned in a temporary file that can be edited and reviewed by the user.
      Returns:
      list of paths to all temporary files @ in case of issue writing to file
      Throws:
      IOException - either IO or ResultsException, when impossible to save/review results

    • include

      public void include(Properties properties)
      Includes a set of properties in the new contents of the file.
      Parameters:
      properties - to include (as if found in original file)

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets all remaining file-related information, to [re-]start the translation process.

    • resetLanguages

      public void resetLanguages()

    • isDone

      public boolean isDone()
      Returns:
      boolean true if translation process is over successfully, false otherwise

    • getTargetFiles

      public List<LocaleFile> getTargetFiles()
      Returns:
      list of all resulting target files

    • getPath

      public String getPath()

    • getSource

      public LocaleFile getSource()
      Returns:
      source file that has been input to the translator

    • areResultsComplete

      public boolean areResultsComplete() throws IncompleteResultsException
      In case that a given property has not been translated into the chosen target language, the key with the empty value is included in the target file.
      Returns:
      boolean true if all properties found in source file have been translated to the respective target language in all target files
      Throws:
      IncompleteResultsException - in case it has not been possible to complete translations of all keys

    • setTargetLanguages

      public void setTargetLanguages(List<String> languages, String defaultLang)

    • setAutoMode

      public void setAutoMode() throws ResourceException, SQLException
      Throws:
      ResourceException
      SQLException

    • setAutoMode

      public void setAutoMode(TranslationMode automaticTranslator) throws ResourceException, SQLException
      Throws:
      ResourceException
      SQLException

    • setManualMode

      public void setManualMode()

    • getResultsPaths

      public List<String> getResultsPaths()
      Returns:
      absolute paths of manually-translated file
